songs.title: Respect
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
1 and 2 and 3 and 4
This my rap song

[Break]
1-2-3-4
I get really sick and tired of boys up in my face

[Verse 1]
Pick up lines like "What's your sign" won't get you any place
When me and all my girls go walking down the street
It seems we can't go anywhere without a car that
Goes "Beep-beep"

[Pre-Chorus]
Because this body is a priceless piece of loving
Unconditionally
So, Mr. Big-stuff, who you think you are?
You was thinking you's gonna get it for free
No, no, no

[Chorus]
Hey ladies
(Yeah!)
Let 'em know it ain't easy
R-E-S-P-E-C-T
Let's come tog eta'
Siesta's
(Yeah!)
Its time to be greedy
Nothing' good comes for free

[Verse 2]
Mirror on the wall, damn I sure look fine
I can't blame those horny boys, I would make me
Mine
When I pass you in a club, "Ooh, lala!" you gasp
Back up boy, I ain't your toy, or your piece of
Ass

[Pre-Chorus]
Because this body is a priceless piece of loving
Unconditionally
So, Mr. Big-stuff, who you think you are?
You was thinking you's gonna get it for free
No, no, no

[Chorus]
Hey ladies
(Yeah!)
Let 'em know it ain't easy
R-E-S-P-E-C-T
Let's come tog eta'
Siesta's
(Yeah!)
Its time to be greedy
Nothing' good comes for free
Hey ladies
(Yeah!)
Let 'em know it ain't easy
R-E-S-P-E-C-T
Let's come tog eta'
Siesta's
(Yeah!)
Its time to be greedy
Nothing' good comes for free

[Verse 3]
No jealousy, no envy girls, c'mon, let's work it
Out
No freebies in the limousine, that's not what its
About
Let 'em know there's work to do, give it up he
Won't call you
Respect is just a minimum, go on girl and get you
Some

1-2-3-4

[Chorus]
Hey ladies
(Yeah!)
Let 'em know it ain't easy
R-E-S-P-E-C-T
Let's come tog eta'
Siesta's
(Yeah!)
Its time to be greedy
Nothing' good comes for free
Hey ladies
(Yeah!)
Let 'em know it ain't easy
R-E-S-P-E-C-T
Let's come tog eta'
Siesta's
(Yeah!)
Its time to be greedy
Nothing' good comes for free

[Outro]
Let's come together
C'mon girls let's work it out
Let's come together
We'll show them what we're talking bout
Let's come together
C'mon girls let's work it out
Let's come together
Let's come together
Let's come together
Nothing good comes for free
